item.title: Getting started with phaser-framework
item.description: Getting Started Phaser # Create a folder Create an index.html inside the new directory. Open it in the Bracket editor Download the Phaser repository from github, then grab the phaser.js file from the build folder. Place the file inside your project directory. Open index.html and link the phaser.js inside the header tag. <!doctype html> My Gamer <script type="text/javascript" src="lib/phaser.js"></script> <style type="text/css"> body { margin: 0; } </style> Create another js file inside the directory named game.
